name: FatPlant
description:
FatPlant pays homage to both old school Super Mario Bros. games and graphics, as well as to the new school indie game hit Flappy Bird. The mechanics are similar to Flappy Bird, but with a few twists - the player still uses a one-button control system to flap along the screen, but some extra physics, collectables and enemies create a bit more of a challenge vs. reward system. The graphics are in the style of Super Mario Bros, but are original renderings of the iconic terrain, enemies, and items.

Available for Mac and PC!
